title: Episode 132: The Medium Man (Feat. Phresher)
itunes:title: Episode 132: The Medium Man (Feat. Phresher)
description:
On this weeks episode, Phresher sits with ladies of Lip Service to discuss his relationship with Eminem, his new album, and MUCH more. Phresher tells a hilarious story about the time he urgently needed toilet paper while in a public bathroom. The ladies discuss what everyone thinks about when they masturbate, if it's okay to hire an attractive assistant, as well if men like their nipples to be played with.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
